name: Weather Lord
description: There's a 100 percent chance of FUN when you play Weather Lord, a unique time management game that puts the forces of nature at your fingertips and then challenges you to complete tasks on 40 thrilling levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB 3D graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c
